Trade/Device Name(s): Medical Wire & Equipment Virocult Virus Collection and Transport System
Regulation Name(s): Microbiological specimen collection and transport device
Specimen Container(s): Transport tube with open cell polyurethane pad
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Medical Wire & Equipment Virocult system for collection and transport of viral specimens for culture.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended to preserve the viability and infectivity of viral specimens for viral culture during transport from the collection site to the testing laboratory.
